mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letters of instruction to surgeons and assistant surgeons of hospitals and others in charge of the money and other effects of deceased officers and soldiers: with the laws, regulations, and others relating thereto / Richmond, August 1, 1864
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Confederate States of America. Department of the Treasury. Second Auditor's Office.
Confederate States of America. War Department.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: W.H.S. Taylor, Second Auditor Confederate States.
Contains War Dept. General orders nos. 80, 49, 67, 68 and 1 Oct. 1862--Jan. 1864.
Accompanied by ms list of the effects of several soldiers made pursuant to the orders.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: One folded leaf from a logbook listing deceased soldiers and their effects, which was laid in, has been transferred to MSS 12511.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Personal belongings--Confederate States of America
